DOC.brief_summary: The project test strategy integrate 25 hour relationship education exist employment program low-income individual age 18-30 . It use 2-arm randomized control trial test effect full package service participant ' employment outcome relationship outcome .
DOC.brief_title: Testing Effectiveness Integrating Relationship Education Into Existing Workforce Readiness Program
DOC.detailed_description: The study examine program FWCA , currently offer Career Pathways Bridge program three location St. Louis County Missouri . The evaluation test strategy integrate relationship education exist workforce readiness program . FWCA plan add approximately 17 hour content Within My Reach relationship education curriculum two-week job readiness workshop offer part Career Pathways Bridge program . Second , FWCA add eight additional one-hour relationship skills education session customer attend five week complete initial two-week job readiness workshop . The evaluation use 2-arm randomized control trial test effect full package service participant ' employment outcome relationship outcomes . The target population low-income individual age 18-30 living St. Louis County , Missouri . The study aim enroll 1000 individual 2 year . The Metropolitan Employment Training ( MET ) Center primary recruitment service location .
